title: Google\Cloud\SecurityCenter\V1\NotificationConfig\StreamingConfig
name: StreamingConfig
description:
The config for streaming-based notifications, which send each event as soon as it is detected.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.securitycenter.v1.NotificationConfig.StreamingConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.filter
params.description: Expression that defines the filter to apply across create/update events of assets or findings as specified by the event type. The expression is a list of zero or more restrictions combined via logical operators AND and OR. Parentheses are supported, and OR has higher precedence than AND. Restrictions have the form <field> <operator> <value> and may have a - character in front of them to indicate negation. The fields map to those defined in the corresponding resource. The supported operators are: = for all value types. >, <, >=, <= for integer values. :, meaning substring matching, for strings. The supported value types are: string literals in quotes. integer literals without quotes. boolean literals true and false without quotes.

methods.name: getFilter
methods.description:
Expression that defines the filter to apply across create/update events of assets or findings as specified by the event type. The expression is a list of zero or more restrictions combined via logical operators AND and OR. Parentheses are supported, and OR has higher precedence than AND.

Restrictions have the form <field> <operator> <value> and may have a - character in front of them to indicate negation. The fields map to those defined in the corresponding resource. The supported operators are:

  • = for all value types.
  • >, <, >=, <= for integer values.
  • :, meaning substring matching, for strings. The supported value types are:
  • string literals in quotes.
  • integer literals without quotes.
  • boolean literals true and false without quotes.
